generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb.
- building: A white building with a sloped roof is visible in the background on the right side of the road.
- wall: A low white wall is visible along the right side of the road, near the building.
- fence: A chain-link fence is visible on the far right side of the image, behind some vegetation.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with traffic lights and another with a sign.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A rectangular traffic sign with text is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: There is dense vegetation, including trees and bushes, along both sides of the road.
- terrain: There is grass and other vegetation on the right side of the road, beyond the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A person is visible riding a motorcycle in the center of the road.
- rider: The person riding the motorcycle is classified as a rider.
- car: A blue car is visible behind the motorcycle, driving in the same direction.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the center of the road, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
